articles.content: SAN FRANCISCO INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT (BCN) Hundreds of airport workers will strike Wednesday at San Francisco International Airport to highlight demands for affordable health care benefits, according … [+1256 chars]

articles.author: Amanda Macias, Amelia Lucas
articles.title: Glass bottle shortages put pressure on wine and spirits companies ahead of key holiday season - CNBC
articles.description: Glass bottles are in short supply, putting pressure on winemakers and distillers ahead of the holiday season.
articles.content: Glass bottles move down a conveyor belt on the Jack Daniel's Single Barrel Select Tennessee Whiskey bottling line at Jack Daniel's Distillery in Lynchburg, Tennessee, U.S., on Thursday, Jan. 30, 2014… [+5353 chars]
